name: HL_REQ_REQUIREMENT_AUDIT
description: This table extracts the related multiple response Request Audit Requirements (I HLR 1145) item.

columns.name: HLR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the request record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: REQUIREMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The audit trail for this Logistics Request's requirements (I HLR 145).
